modules.title: Click on a row to see the Wikipedia article

template:
This page references all articles with SMILES problems

 

You can click on any line to open the corresponding article on Wikipedia

 

SMILES with errors ({{ count.errors }})

 

Those SMILES could not be processed by the parser

 

Pages without correct SMILES ({{ count.nogood }})

 

List of pages in which all the SMILES have errors. Therefore these pages can not be found in the search page

 

Duplicates ({{ count.dup }})

 

List of pages that contain several SMILES that represent the exact same structure

 

Not found ({{ count.notfound }})

 

List of pages that contain a Chembox or Drugbox but no SMILES field

 

 

Last data extraction: {{ count.date|date("m/d/Y") }}

<iframe id="wikipedia-iframe" src="{{ url }}" width="100%" height="100%" style="border: none; vertical-align: bottom;"></iframe>
<script>
    var iframe = document.getElementById('wikipedia-iframe');
    iframe.contentWindow.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        $(iframe.contentDocument.body).css({
            'margin-left': 0,
            border: 'none'
        });
    });
</script>
